include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (PACPARSER_ARCHIVE "${PACPARSER_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/src/static/libpacparser.a")

register_external_lib (libpacparser ${PACPARSER_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${PACPARSER_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${PACPARSER_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/src -D_BUILT_IN_PACPARSER")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${PACPARSER_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/src -D_BUILT_IN_PACPARSER")
